extendedInfo.description: The CC 9068 App is the latest innovation from the company BURY Technologies. BURY offers a range of products in the area of hands-free car kits, car phones, cradle systems and electronic logbooks for the automobile retrofit market.The clever combination of an App and a hands-free car kit requiring fixed installation is the highlight of this new product. Once installed and uploaded, you simply transfer the control panel of the hands-free car kit to your smartphone. This then becomes a central console.Please note: this App does not work independently. It only works in combination with the hands-free car kit CC 9068 App which has to be installed in your vehicle.These are your benefits in detail:- The product enables you to make telephone calls in your vehicle that are within the law in a range of different countries- Safety aspect: your hands can stay on the steering wheel thanks to the voice control- Use of the vehicle's own sound system for the optimum sound quality of the voice output and music playback- The fixed installation system enables automatic radio muting when making telephone callsThe benefits of the hands-free car kit are as follows:- DialogPlus voice control- Magic word activation- Multipoint function- Voice memo recordings- Text-to-speech technology- Music playback- Making telephone conference callsThe benefits of the App are:- You can use your smartphone as a visual output medium- The operation of the App via the touchscreen on your smartphone- No separate display or its installation is required in the vehicleFurther details on the product and details on the source are available on the BURY homepage at http://www.bury.com. If you have any questions on this product please do not hesitate to send an email to our hotline. The contact address is: hotline@bury.com. Please note that we are only able to respond to enquiries that are sent to us in German or English.

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: All I get on Samsung Galaxy S is trying to make a connection
reviews.author: Paul Hoskins

reviews.title: Absolute Rubbish
reviews.comment: Total junk!!  Doesn\'t read text messages as advertised! Quality of cradle is crap! Doesn\'t charge the iPhone! Kept disconnecting from Bluetooth every 5 minutes! Played music randomly!!!  I sent it back to CAR COMMUNICATIONS LTD (who are complete gansters by the way) who said there was nothing wrong with the kit and charged by \302\24340 for returning a faulty product!! Shame on you!  Bury wanted nothing to do with their faulty kit either!!  STAY WELL CLEAR OF BURY & Car Communications!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good car kit
reviews.comment: Awesome bit of kit. Would be 5 stars if it would let me choose my playlists on the music feature from my galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User
